name: Potion Pals (Mikkel)
description:
One of you will gather ingredients and fend off wildlife, the other will prepare/brew the ingredients and then hand potions off to your customers.

Interact with UI using the cursor, and press ESC to pause the game/open menu (a bit broken in fullscreen in most browsers).

Player 1 (gatherer) default controls:
- Keyboard: [W-A-S-D] to move, [E] to interact/pickup/drop
- Controller: Left joystick to move, "South button" (A on Xbox, X on Playstation) to interact/pickup/drop

Player 2 (brewer) default controls:
- Keyboard: Arrow keys to move, [Left Ctrl] to interact/pickup/drop
- Controller: Same as P1 (just on the second controller)

You can swap keyboard & player binding on Numpad-7 and swap controller & player binding on Numpad-8.

Other hotkeys:
M to mute music, comma/dot to change music volume (down/up respectively).
Numpad + & - to increase access to levels (cheat), / to restart level/scene, * to end level early.
